meanings.sent1: The dietetically balanced meal helped improve his health.
meanings.sent2: She followed a dietetically approved plan to lose weight.
meanings.sent3: The dietetically conscious cat refused to eat the unhealthy treats.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe choices were dietetically aligned with her fitness goals.
meanings.sent5: The dietetically colorful salad looked almost too good to eat.

meanings.definition: in a way that is related to diet
meanings.sent1: She ate dietetically, choosing only nutritious foods.
meanings.sent2: He cooked dietetically by using fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The chef humorously described his cooking style as dietetically daring.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the dietetically prepared meal filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant proudly advertised their dietetically crafted menu.

meanings.sent1: She planned her meals dietetically to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: He considered his food choices dietetically before ordering.
meanings.sent3: The friends jokingly compared their dietetically strict regimes.
meanings.sent4: The athlete performed dietetically to enhance performance.
meanings.sent5: The nutritionist spoke dietetically about the importance of balanced meals.
